thread.section_title: EVEN Hotel Times Square South - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Spacious, clean and modern
thread.title_full: Spacious, clean and modern - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Henry T
title: Spacious, clean and modern
text: My wife and I loved the space in this hotel. The room was very clean and modern. Best of all, the space was relatively spacious compared to other hotels we've stayed at. The room was as pictured with enough space to workout in your room! The hotel felt relatively new. My wife and I are picky when it comes to bathrooms and we were quite pleased with the design and space. We would definitely stay here again!
